title: Cabbage Soup 🍵 | Creamy Soup | Winter Treat ❄️
content:
Soup : Winter treat : Cabbage Soup 🍵 Servings: 4 Duration: 20 mins It's time to have soup, hot & creamy soup with cabbage and other stuff.. hope you like it 🙂 Let's start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Cabbage - 250 gms - chopped
  • Green Capsicum - 1 - medium - chopped
  • Onion - 60 gms - chopped
  • Italian Seasoning - 1 tb sp
  • Red chilly flakes  - 1/2 tb sp
  • Fine black pepper powder - 1 tsp
  • Salt - 1/2 tb sp
  • Dried basil 🌿 leaves - 1 tsp
Procedure:
  • Add chopped veggies in pressure cooker
  • Add 1/2 cup water ( 120 ml ) and cook for 2 whistles
  • Let it become cool
  • Add them in mixer grinder and blend till smooth paste
  • Heat sauce pan over medium heat
  • Add blended paste
  • Let it boil
  • Add dried basil, Italian seasoning, salt, pepper powder and red chilly flakes
  • Mix well and cook 10-12 minutes till forms creamy consistency
  • Serve hot in cold winter ❄️
  • Happy cooking and enjoy your day 🙂
